author: mirichmo
body: The existing Windows 10 SDK check is not sufficient because the directory it checks is present even if the SDK is not installed. I made the check more specific to the SDK to tighten the check and enable installation via chocolatey during `Start-PSBootstrap -Package`.

comments.author: msftclas
comments.body:
Hi **@mirichmo**, I'm your friendly neighborhood Microsoft Pull Request Bot (You can call me MSBOT). Thanks for your contribution!

TTYL, MSBOT;

title: Fixing the Win10 sdk presence check
